title: Frank Gore | Ep 117 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Frank Gore | Ep 117 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
ALL THE SMOKE returns with another gridiron episode as Matt and Stak sit-down with NFL running back legend Frank Gore. Gore opens up about his long, hall of fame worthy football career and talks about if he would go back to play even more. Plus, he talks about his big fight vs. Deron Williams on the #PaulWoodley undercard and how he got into boxing. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
